tool_description: Calculates normalized tax rates and identifies tax optimization opportunities for valuation modeling.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: Pretax income and tax expense arrays must be same length.
Invalid tax jurisdiction: Jurisdiction must be recognized for tax rate benchmarking.
Impossible tax rates: Effective tax rates cannot exceed 100% or be negative in normal circumstances.
Insufficient data: At least 2 periods required for meaningful tax rate analysis.
usage: Input pre-tax income and tax expense data across periods with jurisdiction information. Tool calculates normalized tax rates for valuation use.

normalized_tax_rate.description: Recommended normalized tax rate for valuation

statutory_vs_effective.description: Difference between statutory and effective rates
